name: Bubble Trouble Boba Shop
description:
Goth Goat and Kawaii Kitty own the Bubble Trouble Boba Shop! Help them make and serve boba drinks that blend their adorably opposite aesthetics!

Submission to Global Game Jam 2022

Credits: 

Game Designer, Music: Athena Sullins 

Game Designer, Programmer, Animator: Yi Xie

Game Designer, UI/UX Designer, Artist: Morgan Creek

Game Designer, Music/Sound Designer, Lead Artist: Camden Pettijohn

Heavy Metal Music Composer: Michael Gunnarson
